files.content:
{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-dark-honey",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Dark Honey Theme by shadcndesign.com",
  "meta": {
    "tier": "free"
  },
  "cssVars": {
    "theme": {
      "radius-sm": "var(--radius-sm)",
      "radius-md": "var(--radius-md)",
      "radius-lg": "var(--radius-lg)",
      "radius-xl": "var(--radius-xl)",
      "font-sans": "var(--font-sans)",
      "font-mono": "var(--font-mono)",
      "shadow-2xs": "var(--shadow-2xs)",
      "shadow-xs": "var(--shadow-xs)",
      "shadow-sm": "var(--shadow-sm)",
      "shadow-md": "var(--shadow-md)",
      "shadow-lg": "var(--shadow-lg)",
      "shadow-xl": "var(--shadow-xl)",
      "shadow-2xl": "var(--shadow-2xl)"
    },
    "light": {
      "primary": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.3622 0.006 56.043)",
      "background": "oklch(0.216 0.006 56.043)",
      "border": "oklch(0.374 0.009 67.558)",
      "card": "oklch(0.216 0.006 56.043)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "input": "oklch(0.374 0.009 67.558)",
      "muted": "oklch(0.147 0.004 49.25)",
      "popover": "oklch(0.216 0.006 56.043)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.258 0.049 100.453)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372 / 0.15)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.352 0.036 94.679)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.716 0.009 56.259)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(0.147 0.004 49.25)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.258 0.049 100.453)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(0.216 0.006 56.043)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.985 0.001 106.424)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.374 0.009 67.558)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.905 0.161 99.372 / 0.15)",
      "font-sans": "Nunito Sans, sans-serif",
      "radius-sm": "0.25rem",
      "radius-md": "0.5rem",
      "radius-lg": "0.875rem",
      "radius-xl": "1rem"
    },
    "dark": {}
  }
}
